[File: source_map.rs] [Compatibility] [Deprecation] Are there mechanisms to handle deprecated source map formats from older Move compiler versions? (Medium)
[File: marking.rs] [Compatibility] [Marking Schema] Can marking message schemas evolve without breaking tools that parse markings? (Low)
[File: source_map.rs] [Function: dummy_from_view()] [Script vs Module] When handling Script vs Module in match statement, can malformed bytecode satisfy neither branch causing panic? (High)
